name: Crumbling Crypt
description:
Info:

This game was made for Brakeys Game Jam 2023.1 in a week.  Explore 8 levels of side-scroller dungeons where you have to locate and steal treasure from collapsing catacombs.

Controls: 

A - Left       D - Right       Space - Jump

Esc - Pause      E - Pickup

Development:

Developer Github: https://github.com/Alexdlc5

Project Github: https://github.com/Alexdlc5/Brakeys_Game_Jam_2023.1
